name: Glitch Game (Unkown Dev)
description:
You woke up in a building that looked like your job, which you went to every day. But it is strange that no one is in the building. What happened here? You'll have to find out! Browse the entire building and search computers and the Internet! You have to find what happened in the building and what is hidden in it...
